title: Red rectangle below glyphs in Fontlab
content:
I am working on a typeface and I notice these small red rectangles below several glyphs in FontLab.

Can anyone tell me what this indicates? See attached image below.

Thanks

-DJ

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [red dots.JPG](http://web.archive.org/web/20140720180812/http:/typophile.com/files/red%20dots.JPG) | 13.3 KB |
author: djsherman

comments.content:
It means someone else has already designed a glyph just like yours.

(Kidding.)

Actually, it means that the glyph is the key glyph in a kerning class.

(RTFM, by the way. Took me only ten seconds to find the answer by looking there.)
